text:
"직무유기에 가깝겠지만... 알아서 할게, 너는 그런 거 신경 끄고."
"......"
"이리 와."
"앞에서."
"앞?"
"앞에서 다 듣고 있을 걸요. 다 여기만 쳐다 볼 건데."
"근데."
"근데 라니요."
"뻔히 그런 사이 라는 거 알겠지, 그게 뭐."
"아니..."
풀어져 있던 정성찬의 표정이 굳어져 간다. 순식간에 얼린 듯이 차가운 표정을 한다. 송은석이 자신의 뜻 대로 행동하지 않으면 저런 표정을 한다. 하얀색 얼굴로 얼음같은 표정을 지으면 투명한 감정이 그대로 보이는데 그걸 보면 송은석이 겁 먹으니까.
나도 그런데 연기 하는 사람인데. 가오는 덜 갖고 태어났지만 뻔뻔한 건 갖고 태어나서 송은석은 최근 1년 정성찬 앞에서 철판을 슬슬 깔기 시작 했다. 스폰서에게 쌓이기 시작하는 악감정들, 자리가 달라진 송은석 스스로 감당이 안 되기 시작해서. 정성찬, 너 그래서 어쩔 건데, 너 그래서 이대로 괜찮은데, 이대로 괜찮으면 왜 괜찮은데, 괜찮은 이유는 어차피 휙 떠나면 그만이라서 이러는 거?
"떠든다고요."
"그게 왜."
"아니..."
너는 다른 곳에 입 대면 끝이겠지만 나는 아니라고. 나도 대책은 세워 놔야지. 남자한테 스폰 받아 먹는 거 그냥 아는 거랑 눈으로 보여주는 거랑 다른데.
trans:
“It might be almost close to dereliction of duty, but... I’ll deal with it, so you don’t need to worry about it.”
"......"
"Come here"
"In front"
"Front"
"I think they'll be listening to everything in front. Maybe they'll all be just looking here."
"But."
"What's wrong."
"They obviously know that it's that kind of relationship, buuly for them."
"No..."
Jeong Seong-chan's expression, which had been relaxed, hardens. He takes on a cold expression as if he had frozen in an instant. Song Eun-seok makes that kind of expression when he doesn't do what he wants. His transparent emotions are clearly visible as he makes an icy expression with a white face, Song Eun-seok gets scared when he sees that.
I'm an actor, too. Song Eun-seok, who was born with less form but was born shameless, has recently started to act like a brazen person before Jeong Seong-chan. The ill feelings starting to build up towards the sponsor, and Song Eun-seok is starting to not be able to handle himself now that his position has changed. Seong-chan Jeong, so what are you going to do now? And you’re okay with it like this, when you're okay with this, why are you okay, The reason it's okay is because you can leave whenever you want so there won't be any problems?
"They might spread rumors."
"What about it."
"No..."
If you go somewhere else, it'll be over, but not for me. I also need to come up with a plan. When it comes to being sponsored by men, what they just know and what I show it to them are different.
